refreshsitestatstable-desc: Offers a [[Special:RefreshSiteStatsTable|special page]] for refreshing the value of the fields “ss_good_articles”, “ss_total_pages”, and “ss_users“ in the table “[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:Site_stats_table site_stats]”.
refreshsitestatstable-intro: Inconsistencies in the “[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:Site_stats_table site_stats]” table can be corrected automatically here.
refreshsitestatstable-status-msg: Entries in the MediaWiki database are $1.
refreshsitestatstable-inconsistent-good: The number of good articles in the MediaWiki database was incorrect and was successfully corrected from $1 to $2.
refreshsitestatstable-inconsistent-total: The number of total pages in the MediaWiki database was incorrect and was successfully corrected from $1 to $2.
refreshsitestatstable-inconsistent-image: The number of images in the MediaWiki database was incorrect and was successfully corrected from $1 to $2.
refreshsitestatstable-inconsistent-users: The number of users in the MediaWiki database was incorrect and was successfully corrected from $1 to $2.
refreshsitestatstable-status-ok-good: The number of good articles in the MediaWiki database is correct.
refreshsitestatstable-status-ok-total: The number of total pages in the MediaWiki database is correct.
refreshsitestatstable-status-ok-images: The number of images in the MediaWiki database is correct.
refreshsitestatstable-status-ok-users: The number of users in the MediaWiki database is correct.
refreshsitestatstable-status-error: Entries in the MediaWiki database are incorrect. The error could not be fixed.
